name: World Congress on “Geology & Earth Science”
content: Innovinc Organization extends a heartfelt welcome to the inaugural “World Congress on Geology & Earth Science” which is slated to hold from July 11-13, 2019 at London, United Kingdom with the theme of “Providing Innovative Research Methodologies for Geoscience". Geoscience-2019 provides a meeting place for researchers and industry members at the forefront of technological developments in the field of Earth Science and Geology. We are anticipating more than 300 participants around the globe with thought provoking Keynote lectures, Oral and Poster presentations.
